#set page(width: 10cm, height: auto) #set heading(numbering: “1.”)

= Fibonacci sequence The Fibonacci sequence is defined through the recurrence relation Fn=F(n−1)+F(n−2)F_n = F_(n-1) + F_(n-2). It can also be expressed in closed form:

$ F_n = round(1 / sqrt(5) phi.alt^n), quad phi.alt = (1 + sqrt(5)) / 2 $

#let count = 8 #let nums = range(1, count + 1) #let fib(n) = ( if n <= 2 { 1 } else { fib(n - 1) + fib(n - 2) } )

The first #count numbers of the sequence are:

#align(center, table( columns: count, ..nums.map(n => $F_#n$), ..nums.map(n => str(fib(n))), ))
